big.box: R u l e M L

section.label: Introduction
section.p: As Object-Oriented RuleML has been developed, the need for translators to and from Object-Oriented RuleML has become apparent. This site contains current translators pairs to and from Object-Oriented RuleML. If you have developed any translators dealing with Object-Oriented RuleML please contact Harold Boley to share your work.

section.label: Object-Oriented to Positional RuleML
section.p: 2003-03-26: Stephen Greene has specified XSLT translators between Positional RuleML and Object-Oriented RuleML.
